channel.title: **new modds just discoverd** postings for a limited time v.1.2.5
channel.description:
this a minecraft modding website i found it has insanely good mods dowload link: http://adf.ly/AMBWY
the mods are: forestry mod clay solider mod revolver mod slime boots lionking mod archeology mod water shadding mod
more creeps and weirdos mod zombie mod

item.title: **new modds just discoverd** postings for a limited time v.1.2.5
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:11, topic:448242”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=551134.msg4040612#msg4040612 date=1341598456]
Clay soldiers is awesome. I use it when I feel like playing god.
[/quote]
Especially with the clay nexus, placing a bunch of them and using them to make different classes, make bases, and make them duke it out, now thats pretty awesome

Never ending battle, almost at least

I actually have a map like this, its an edited version i made of an existing map to fit that condition, and its awesome lol

Anyways, when is this limited time posting amazing offer going to be removed? lol[/quote]
possible to use it in making a chess game?

Read full topic
item.source: **new modds just discoverd** postings for a limited time v.1.2.5

item.title: **new modds just discoverd** postings for a limited time v.1.2.5
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

reyx7:

Clay soldiers is awesome. I use it when I feel like playing god.

Especially with the clay nexus, placing a bunch of them and using them to make different classes, make bases, and make them duke it out, now thats pretty awesome

Never ending battle, almost at least

I actually have a map like this, its an edited version i made of an existing map to fit that condition, and its awesome lol

Anyways, when is this limited time posting amazing offer going to be removed? lol
